snippet.title: Omen of Sorrow - Release Date Trailer | PS4 Exclusive
snippet.description:
Clear your mind, clench your fists and get ready for a wicked battle. Omen of Sorrow® delivers a deep 2D battle system inspired by the classics, bringing back the edge, mindset and philosophy rooted in the genre's arcade legacy, taking it to the next level with innovative features and fighting mechanics. Join the battle, conquer darkness.

http://www.omenofsorrow.com

Follow us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aonegamespage/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AOneGames
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/AOneGames 

AOne Games
